pullrequest.title: Resolution option functionality for semi-supervised mode

content.raw: This function name has a mix of camel case and underscores. I understand it's because of the "supervisionLabel" name but reconsider creating a function for only setting a specific variable. I know previous examples used a function here but if it's a 3 liner that is only used once it might be best to just move it down here with a simple comment like "Create the supervision label's conditonal parents GMTK specification".
